title: The Starry Night
description: The Starry Night is an oil-on-canvas painting by Dutch Post-Impressionist painter Vincent van Gogh. Painted in June 1889, it depicts the view from the east-facing window of his asylum room at Saint-Rémy-de-Provence, just before sunrise, with the addition of an imaginary village.
provenance: Museum of Modern Art, New York
credit_line: Acquired through the Lillie P. Bliss Bequest
text: This masterpiece showcases van Gogh's distinctive style with swirling clouds and vibrant colors. The cypress tree in the foreground creates a dramatic contrast against the night sky filled with stars and a crescent moon.
